hero.title: Personalized Tech Education: Your Path to Mastery Starts Here.
hero.description: Discover tailored 1-on-1 teaching in Python, SQL, TypeScript, Notion, and more. I guide curious minds of all ages to unlock their full potential.

why_choose_path.title: Why Choose This Path?
why_choose_path.introduction: My approach to teaching is centered on your unique learning style. I provide hands-on, project-based guidance, making complex topics accessible and enjoyable for every learner, from young beginners to seasoned professionals.
why_choose_path.young_learners_description: Engaging and interactive sessions designed to build foundational tech skills and foster a love for learning.
why_choose_path.adult_learners_description: Practical, in-depth mentorship to enhance your skills, solve real-world problems, and advance your career.

success_stories.title: Success Stories from the Path
success_stories.testimonial1_text: Learning Python with [Your Name] was incredible! The lessons were so clear and fun, and I built my first game. Highly recommend for kids!
success_stories.testimonial2_text: I needed to pick up TypeScript for a new role, and [Your Name]'s guidance was invaluable. The personalized approach helped me grasp complex concepts quickly. A true expert!

common_questions.title: Common Questions on the Path
common_questions.q1_title: What is the typical session format?
common_questions.q1_description: Sessions are typically 1-on-1, conducted online via video call, and are highly interactive with a focus on hands-on coding and problem-solving.
common_questions.q2_title: Can I customize my learning path?
common_questions.q2_description: Absolutely! While we have suggested paths, I work with each student to tailor the curriculum to their specific goals and interests.
common_questions.q3_title: What age groups do you teach?
common_questions.q3_description: I teach both young learners (typically 8+) and adults. My teaching style adapts to suit the age and experience level of the student.
